TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WorkflowOutlineNode extends System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

Docs.summary: Represents a node in a workflow outline document displayed in the workflow designer.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]
A <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowOutline> contains one WorkflowOutlineNode for each activity a user adds to a workflow design surface.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity activity) cil managed

Docs.param: The to associate with the node.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class by using an activity.
Docs.exception: contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).

Docs.summary: Gets the activity associated with the node.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Each activity added to a workflow design surface is represented in the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowOutline> document by a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowOutlineNode>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnActivityRename(string newName) cil managed

Docs.param: A string that contains the name to display in the label of the workflow outline node.
Docs.summary: Changes the text displayed in the label of the workflow outline node to the specified name.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void RefreshNode() cil managed

remarks.format: ## Remarks RefreshNode updates the foreground color and text of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowOutlineNode> to the settings associated with the activity the node represents on the workflow design surface.
